titleStmt.title: To all rulers and magistrates in England, and all men in authority from the highest to the lowest a few sober words tendred to your serious consideration, which you are desired to read with moderation.
titleStmt.author: Wastfield, Robert, fl. 1647-1665.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages stained with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
